marklogic.body: I got a question for you Papi.....clearly, we're both big time Tiger fans.....but I need to know, what do you have against Phil?Â The only time I've ever seen professionals in person was last years US Open (a clear misnomer since it was more like a normal event).Â Anyway, I followed Phil for some of the first and second round, and I can tell you, as much as he was probably Burning inside from how he was playing, he still put a smile on for the crowd......he's a classy guy, and I just don't get why you hate him?Â Just because you're a TW fan, it doesn't mean you need to hate Phil.....just so you know!
